achievements.name: Capybara
achievements.description: You are focused like capybara. Capybara applauds you.

achievements.name: Milly
achievements.description: Milly likes to stick his tongue out. |Bleh! Too focused! Don't you have any time for silly Milly?|

achievements.name: Doge
achievements.description: |Wow! Such focus! Much zen! So proud. Much wow!| Kabosu-chan seems to be very impressed by you and your ability to focus.

achievements.name: Floppa
achievements.description: Floppa is a caracal living in Moscat, Russia. His ears are a bit silly. Don't poke fun at him, though, he will take offence.

achievements.name: Unico
achievements.description: Omedetou! You found a rare Japanese cat! Unico is a cat that likes to sit in a box.

achievements.name: Gusic
achievements.description: Gusic stares at you intensely: Hmm...hmm...I smell someone silly!

achievements.name: Mr. Polite
achievements.description: Yes Sire, how do you do? Very well? That's all very good, Sire.

achievements.name: Pop Cat
achievements.description: Pop pop pop pop pop! Pop pop pop pop pop!

achievements.name: Milk-face
achievements.description: A cat with an unquenchable thirst for milk. It is likely that he became fat from all the milk.

achievements.name: Maxwell
achievements.description: Real name: Jess. Maxwell is a tuxedo cat who likes to spin around endlessly. It's curious how he doesn't get dizzy. He is probably very powerful, but he's not showing it.

achievements.name: Luna
achievements.description: Luna likes her uranium very much. In fact, she likes it raw. She is often seen crunching on it.

achievements.name: Nyan Cat
achievements.description: |Nyan nyan nyan nyan nyan nyan nyan nyan nyan nyan nyan nyan nyan nyan nyan nyan nyan nyan|

achievements.name: Cheeseborger
achievements.description: This cat really likes cheeseburger. If you aren't lactose intolerant, you should also get a cheeseburger. You deserve a reward for coming so far!

achievements.name: Mrs. Kirby
achievements.description: Mrs. Kirby is a fighter. No, don't be misguided by her cute face. A feisty, ferocious cat, she sees the feeder as her absolute territory, and kicks out other cats. For her, violence is often her first resort.

achievements.name: Mr. Oreo
achievements.description: Mr. Oreo has a tendency of moving too suddenly at times, scaring the cats around him. This has caused Ms. Eeper, who he sleeps with, to be upset with him several times.

achievements.name: Car on Car
achievements.description: A cat who is a professional at driving. He looks very nonchalant and comfortable, which impresses people.

achievements.name: Cat-caller
achievements.description: Good morning sir, how can I help you? Ah yes, do try turning it off and on. Hopefully that works.

achievements.name: Mrs. Eeper
achievements.description: An eepy lady, often seen eeping in front of the feeders. Sometimes, she eeps in a loaf position. Please don't disturb her!

achievements.name: Mr. Croissant
achievements.description: A cute cat that resembles a croissant. Lives at Happy Canteen.

achievements.name: Sir Goobert
achievements.description: Goobert is a bit of a goober, he's very silly, but he's also brave as he took down Mt. Kibble once. Goobert is a very special boy. Treat him with kindness.

achievements.name: Mr. Fresh
achievements.description: Mr. Fresh only wants fresh kibbles and snacks. He'll wait for as long as it takes, until he gets it.

achievements.name: The Gluttonous Beast
achievements.description: This beast of a cat may appear small, but his ferocious appetite rivals even those who are bigger of him.

achievements.name: Stinkwalker
achievements.description: The stinkwalker is the manifestation of decay and despair. Even miles away, his presence can be acutely felt.

achievements.name: War Cat
achievements.description: War Cat has seen much...but he's still shocked by how far you have come. Good job!
